sense.def:
A way of doing something
je dejanje ali vrsta dejanj, ki jih opravimo, da dosežemo določen učinek.

seg.quote: ...different ways of cooking fish.
The only way to stop an accident is to remove the risk.

sense.def:
The way that an action is done
označuje lastnost nekega dejanja.

seg.quote: He smiles in a superior way.
He hated the way she talked.

sense.def:
The ways of a particular person or group of people
so navade ali običajno vedênje določene osebe ali skupine oseb.

seg.quote: ...the difficulty of changing one's ways.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da je nekaj tako, kot je,
in a way stated
, mislimo na vidik nečesa ali učinek, ki ga tisto ima.

seg.quote: Breast feeding is valuable in a number of ways.
The job was changing me in a way that I had not expected.

sense.def:
The way one feels about something
je človekov odnos do nečesa ali mnenje o nečem.

seg.quote: Do you still feel the same way?

sense.def:
Kadar omenimo
the way that something happens
, mislimo na dejstvo, da se je nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: Do you remember the way the boat leaked?

sense.def:
To have a way with people or things
pomeni biti zelo spreten pri ravnanju z osebami ali stvarmi določene vrste.

seg.quote: ...a village boy who had a way with horses.

sense.def:
The way to a particular place
je cesta, po kateri moramo iti, če hočemo priti v določen kraj.

seg.quote: A man asked me the way to Tower Bridge.

sense.def:
Kadar gremo ali gledamo
a particular way
, gremo ali gledamo v določeno smer.

seg.quote: Will you come this way, please?
I waved but she was looking the other way.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
the right way up
ali
the right way round
, je obrnjeno v pravo smer.

Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
in the way
, preprečuje, da bi se prosto gibali ali jasno videli.

seg.quote: Get out of my way.

sense.def:
V stavbi je
the way in
vhod,
the way out
pa izhod.

Izraz
way
uporabimo v frazah, kot sta
push one's way somewhere
ali
work one's way somewhere
, ki se nanašajo na oteženo, počasno ali dolgotrajno gibanje ali napredovanje.

seg.quote: You can't force your way into somebody's house.
He started to work his way through the back copies of ‘The Times’.

sense.def:
Izraz
way
uporabljamo v frazah, kot sta
a long way
in
a little way
, da povemo, kako daleč je nekaj.

seg.quote: We're a long way away from Cuba.

sense.def:
Izraz
way
uporabljamo v frazah, kot sta
all the way
in
most of the way
, ki se nanašajo na določeno količino poti ali razdalje.

seg.quote: They drove all the way back without a word.
They're way ahead of us.
You're way below the standard required.

sense.def:
To lose one's way
pomeni izgubiti se in ne vedeti, v katero smer moramo iti, da bi prišli na cilj.

To make one's way somewhere
pomeni nekam hoditi ali potovati.

seg.quote: I made my way back to my seat.

sense.def:
Kadar ena oseba ali stvar
makes way for another
, druga oseba ali stvar zavzame njeno mesto.

seg.quote: Slums have been cleared to make way for new high-rise apartments.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
goes a long way towards doing a particular thing
, hočemo povedati, da pomaga doseči določeno stvar.

seg.quote: Goodwill and cooperation can go a long way towards smoothing your way to the top.

sense.def:
On the way
ali
on one's way
pomeni med potovanjem.

seg.quote: Lynn was on her way home.

sense.def:
To go out of one's way to do something
pomeni posebej se potruditi, da nekaj storimo.

seg.quote: He didn't really go out of his way to help me.

sense.def:
To keep out of someone's way
pomeni nekoga se izogibati.

Kadar je nekaj
out of the way
, je minilo ali smo tisto že obravnavali.

seg.quote: We'll be all right once this meeting is out of the way.

sense.def:
Kadar je neka dejavnost ali načrt
under way
, se je začel in zdaj poteka.

seg.quote: Formal negotiations are under way.

sense.def:
To get one's way
ali
to have one's way
ali
to have everything one's own way
pomeni, da se nekaj zgodi tako, kot nekdo želi.

seg.quote: If Baker has his way, the money will be paid to you.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
you can't have it both ways
, želimo nekoga opomniti, da mora izbrati med dvema možnostima in ne more storiti ali imeti obojega.

Nekdo ali nekaj
has a way of doing a particular thing
rečemo, kadar hočemo povedati, da ponavadi ravna na določen način.

seg.quote: Ex-wives have a way of reappearing.

sense.def:
By the way
rečemo, kadar nekaj dodamo, zlasti nekaj takega, na kar smo se pravkar spomnili.

seg.quote: By the way, this visit of Muller's is strictly secret.
I'm going to sketch in a bit of the background by way of introduction.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in a way
nakažemo, da je naša trditev resnična do določene mere ali v enem pogledu.

seg.quote: In a way, these officers were prisoners themselves.

sense.def:
Z izrazoma
in a big way
in
in a small way
nakažemo razpon ali pomen neke dejavnosti.

seg.quote: They are going into the arms business in a big way.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
in the way of
natančno povemo, o čem govorimo.

seg.quote: He received very little in the way of wages.
